NAME

SYNOPSIS

DESCRIPTION

This interface is made obsolete by setitimer(2) . The function waits a count of before asserting the terminating signal When the signal has successfully been caught, returns the amount of time left on the clock. The maximum number of allowed is 2147483647. If an alarm has been set with another call to will supersede the prior call. The request voids the current alarm.
